channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16956] Refactor FavoredNodePlan to use regionNames as keys
item.description: We would like to rely on the FNPlan cache whether a region is offline or not. Sticking to regionNames as keys makes that possible.
item.summary: Refactor FavoredNodePlan to use regionNames as keys

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Internal refactor. Submitting patch for pre-commit builds to run.
Thiruvel Thirumoolan not sure I understand the motivation for this change. Could you please shed some light. Thanks!
Sorry, just read the description.. Yeah patch looks fine to me (pending QA).
